content: wee socks for wee feet baby cabin socks in three sizes size us shoe size 1 3mo approx 2-3 6-12mo approx 4-5 12-18mo approx yarn wee feet sport yarn one 32-33 gram skein dpn us 2 2 75mm round marker needle for kitchener stitch and weaving in ends gauge 8 stitches to one inch cuff cast on 36 40 40 stitches join into the round with 12 or 16 stitches on each needle 36=12 12 12 40= 12 12 16 work 25 30 30 rounds k2 p2 rib heel setup for size 1 k first 18 stitches and p2 k2 until end you will end with a p2 repeat for a total of 4 heel setup rounds for sizes 2-3 and 4-5 knit the first 19 stitches p1 then k2 p2 until the last stitch move your round marker to here and this becomes the new end of round this is so you end up with one purl stitch on each side of the k2p2 rib on the top of the foot now work three rounds k 20 p1 k2 p2 until last stitch p1 for a total of 4 heel setup rounds heel flap work over the next 18 20 20 and alternate the next two row place these on one needle and the rest of the stitches can be placed on a second needle and ignored for a bit row 1 *sl1 k1* until end of row row 2 sl1 purl until end of row work until 10 12 14 row have been worked 1 heel turn sl1 k10 11 11 ssk k1 turn sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn p2tog will be across the gap left from turning sl1 k6 ssk k1 turn sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn continue in this fashion always decreasing over the gap created on the previous row until all stitches are used gusset shaping sl1 k11 across heel keep the same needle and pick up 6 7 8 stitches along the side of the heel flap with a second needle work in rib pattern across next 18 20 20 stitches with a third needle pick up 6 7 8 stitches along the heel flap knit half of the stitches off of the heel this becomes your new end of the round row 1 first needle k to last three stitches k2tog k1 second needle in rib as established third needle k1 ssk k to end of round row 2 first needle k all stitches second needle in rib as established third needle k all stitches alternate these two rounds until you have 9 10 10 on first and third needle second needle s number will not change foot first needle k all stitches second needle continue to work in rib pattern third needle k all stitches for 12 15 18 rounds toe shaping round 1 first needle k to last three stitches k2tog k1 second needle k1 ssk k to last three stitches k2tog k1 third needle k1 ssk k rest of stitches
